        #include <bits/stdc++.h>
        using namespace std;
        typedef long long ll;
        const int N = 200000;
        const int M = 200000;
        const int MOD = 1000000007;

        int a[N+1];
        ll f[M*4+1], inv[M*4+1], finv[M*4+1];

        void init() {
            f[0] = f[1] = 1;
            finv[0] = finv[1] = 1;
            inv[1] = 1;
            for (int i=2; i<=M*4; i++) {
                f[i] = f[i-1] * i % MOD;
                inv[i] = (MOD - MOD/i) * inv[MOD%i] % MOD;
                finv[i] = finv[i-1] * inv[i] % MOD;
            }
        }

        ll nCk(int n, int k) {
            if (n<0 || n<k) return 0;
            return f[n] * finv[k] % MOD * finv[n-k] % MOD;
        }

        int main() {
